sentences.sContent: In total, slides have killed five people in the Cuzco region.
sentences.sCn: 在库斯科地区泥石流总共已使5人丧生。

sentences.sContent: Cuzco the capital city, was said by the Spanish to be "as fine as any city in Spain".
sentences.sCn: 库斯科首都被西班牙人认为“其精致可以媲美西班牙的任何城市”。

sentences.sContent: Andean dancers wearingfeathered hats walk during celebrations in honor of the Lord of "QoyllurRit'i" near the town of Tayankani in Cuzco, on June 22, 2011.
sentences.sCn: 2011年6月22日，库斯科的塔亚卡尼镇附近举办的节庆活动中，安第斯山脉的舞者身着羽毛做成的帽子行走在山间。
